Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • Room

  • public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Room : Contains all the needed accessors and modifiers concerning the rooms and exits.
    Version:
    2019
    Author:
    Denoela Guennoc

    • Method Detail

      • getDescription

        public java.lang.String getDescription()
        Accessor : is used to reach the current room description.
        Returns:
        String aDescription

      • setExit

        public void setExit(java.lang.String pDirection,
                    Room pVoisin)
        Modifier : set each room exits depending on the name of the exit and the other room linked to it.

      • getExit

        public Room getExit(java.lang.String pDirection)
        Accessor : @return a value for each possible exit. @return null if the exit doesn't exist in the current room.

      • getExitString

        public java.lang.String getExitString()
        Returns:
        a list of all the possible exits for the current room.

      • getLongDescription

        public java.lang.String getLongDescription()
        Returns:
        a longer description of the current room. It contains the name of the room, the list of its exits and the list of the items in the room.

      • getImageName

        public java.lang.String getImageName()
        Returns:
        a String describing the room's image name.

      • addItem

        public void addItem(Item pItem)
        Used to add an item to the room.

      • getItemDescription

        public java.lang.String getItemDescription()
        Returns:
        the informations about the items located in the current room, returns "Item : " + the list of all the name of the disponibles items. If there's no item in the room, @return "No item here."

      • getItemLongDescription

        public java.lang.String getItemLongDescription()
        Returns:
        the informations about the items located in the current room, returns "Item description : " + the name of the disponibles items, there description and its weight.

      • getRoomItems

        public ItemList getRoomItems()
        Used to access the list of all the items in the room.
        Returns:
        ItemList aRoomItems

      • isExit

        public boolean isExit(Room pRoom)
        Returns:
        true if there is a door between the current room and the room placed as the parameter.
